item.title: タッカー・カールソン、Twitterで元Foxのニュース番組を再開すると発言、イーロン・マスク、Twitterは「いかなる種類の契約も結んでいない」と発言（Washington Post）
item.description:
Washington Post:
Tucker Carlson says he will relaunch his former Fox news show on Twitter; Elon Musk says Twitter has not signed a deal “of any kind whatsoever”  —  Elon Musk tweeted late Tuesday that Twitter had no deal with Carlson and urged people from both sides of the political spectrum to join the site

item.title: イーロン・マスク氏は、Twitterはタッカー・カールソン氏と「いかなる種類の」契約も結んでおらず、彼はすべてのコンテンツクリエイターと同じルールに従うと述べた（Elon Musk/@elonmusk）
item.description:
Elon Musk / @elonmusk:
Elon Musk said Twitter has not signed a deal “of any kind whatsoever” with Tucker Carlson and he will be subject to the same rules as all content creators  —  @EdKrassen @TuckerCarlson On this platform, unlike the one-way street of broadcast, people are able to interact, critique and refute whatever he or anyone may say. And, of course, anything misleading will get @CommunityNotes. I also want to be clear that we have not signed a deal of any kind... https://twitter.com/...

item.title: タッカー・カールソンはTwitterの3分間のビデオで、従来のメディアを非難し、Twitterは言論の自由を認める残された最後の大きなプラットフォームであると述べている（CNBC）。
item.description:
CNBC:
In a three-minute video on Twitter, Tucker Carlson berates traditional media and says Twitter is the last big remaining platform that allows free speech  —  - Tucker Carlson, weeks after being fired from his prime time spot on Fox News, said he is relaunching his show on Twitter.

item.title: ドキュメントとソースタッカー・カールソンがフォックス・ニュースの詐欺と契約違反を告発、カールソンはドミニオンの和解の一環として放送を中止させられたと聞いていた（Axios)
item.description:
Axios:
Docs and sources: Tucker Carlson accuses Fox News of fraud and breach of contract; Carlson was told he was taken off the air as part of the Dominion settlement  —  Tucker Carlson, two weeks after being ousted by Fox News, accused the network Tuesday of fraud and breach of contract …

item.title: FBIは5月8日、かつてGawker、Abrams Media、Deadspin、The Daily Beastで働いたビデオ編集者、Timothy Burkeの自宅で捜索令状を執行した（Matthew Keys/The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
The FBI executed a search warrant May 8 at the home of Timothy Burke, a video editor who once worked at Gawker, Abrams Media, Deadspin, and The Daily Beast  —  A law enforcement source confirms the former video editor, who now runs his own communications firm, is the target of a criminal investigation.

item.title: タッカー・カールソンは、元フォックス・ニュースのスタッフの協力を得て、Twitterで番組を再スタートさせると発表した。
item.description:
Dylan Byers / @dylanbyers:
Tucker Carlson says he will relaunch his show on Twitter with help from ex-Fox News staff; he'd forgo at least $25M Fox owes him to break a non-compete clause  —  🚨 NEWS: Tucker Carlson will relaunch his show *on Twitter* with help from former Fox News staff. He will forgo at least $25 million owed to him by Fox Corp. in order to break non-compete clause. @PuckNews

item.title: MTVニュースが閉鎖、Showtime、MTV Entertainment Studios、Paramount Media Networksが米国で約25％の従業員を解雇（Jennifer Maas/Variety)
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
MTV News is shutting down, as Showtime, MTV Entertainment Studios, and Paramount Media Networks lay off about 25% of their employees in the US  —  Layoffs will be hitting 25% of employees across the Showtime, MTV Entertainment Studios and Paramount Media Networks groups in the U.S. Tuesday …

item.title: 陪審は、ドナルド・トランプが作家のE・ジーン・キャロルを性的虐待し中傷した責任を認め、彼女の民事訴訟で500万ドルを授与したが、彼女のレイプの主張は却下した（NBCニュース）。
item.description:
NBC News:
A jury finds Donald Trump liable for sexually abusing and defaming writer E. Jean Carroll, awarding her $5M in her civil suit, but rejects her rape claim  —  Carroll sued the former president, accusing him of battery over an alleged rape in the 1990s and of defamation for calling her account a “hoax.”

item.title: 情報筋の話：NBCUniversalは、同社を退社し、その苦情がJeff Shell CEOの解雇につながったCNBCのHadley Gambleとの和解を最終決定している（Axios）
item.description:
Axios:
Sources: NBCUniversal is finalizing a settlement with CNBC's Hadley Gamble, who is leaving the company and whose complaint led to CEO Jeff Shell's firing  —  NBCUniversal is finalizing a settlement with CNBC senior international correspondent Hadley Gamble, sources tell Axios.

item.title: フォックス・ニュースの元プロデューサー、アビー・グロスバーグ氏が同局に対する訴訟の1つを自主的に棄却。弁護団は今後数週間で再提訴する意向（Katie Robertson/New York Times）
item.description:
Katie Robertson / New York Times:
Former Fox News producer Abby Grossberg voluntarily dismisses one of her lawsuits against the network; her lawyers intend to refile the case in the coming weeks  —  The lawsuit, brought by Abby Grossberg, accused the cable network of pressuring her to lie in a deposition.

item.title: Metaは、広告収益ではなく、公開されたReelsのパフォーマンスに基づいてFacebookのクリエイターに支払うことをテストし、今後数週間でInstagramに支払いを展開する予定だ（Aisha Malik/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Aisha Malik / TechCrunch:
Meta tests paying Facebook creators based on public Reels' performance, instead of ad earnings, and plans to roll out payouts to Instagram in the coming weeks  —  Meta is testing a new payout model for its Ads on Reels monetization program that pays creators based on the performance of their public Reels …

item.title: ニューヨークを拠点とする暗号アウトレットBlockworksは、黎明期のリサーチとデータ分析の提供を発展させるため、10Tホールディングス主導で$135Mのポストマネー評価で$12Mを調達しました（Sara Fischer/Axios）
item.description:
Sara Fischer / Axios:
NYC-based crypto outlet Blockworks raised $12M led by 10T Holdings at a $135M post-money valuation to develop its nascent research and data analytics offering  —  Blockworks, a media company that covers cryptocurrency for professionals, has raised $12 million at a $135 million post-money valuation …

item.title: NYTはエリザベス・ホームズに同情的なプロフィールを掲載し、彼女の詐欺がもたらす潜在的に巨大な結果を隠蔽したことで批判に直面している（Chloe Berger/Fortune)
item.description:
Chloe Berger / Fortune:
The NYT faces criticism for its sympathetic Elizabeth Holmes profile, which glossed over the potentially massive consequences of her fraud  —  Elizabeth Holmes, the former entrepreneur who was convicted of one of the biggest frauds in business history, swapped out her trademark black turtleneck …

item.title: Fox、第3四半期の売上高は前年同期比18%増の$4.08B、純損失は$50M、主にDominionの和解による、広告収入はスーパーボウルの影響で前年同期比43%増の$1.88B (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)。
item.description:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Fox reports Q3 revenue up 18% YoY to $4.08B and a $50M net loss, mainly due to the Dominion settlement; ad revenue rose 43% YoY to $1.88B due to the Super Bowl  —  The Super Bowl helped Fox's advertising revenue improve by 43%.  —  The high-profile settlement between Fox Corp …

item.title: Nexstar、第1四半期の純利益は前年同期比65%減の$88M、純収入は同4%増の$1.26B、デジタル収入はCWの効果もあり同17%増の$92Mと過去最高を記録 (Jennifer Maas/Variety)
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
Nexstar reports Q1 net income down 65% YoY to $88M, net revenue up 4% YoY to $1.26B, and digital revenue up a record 17% YoY to $92M, in part thanks to the CW  —  Nexstar reported its first-quarter 2023 earnings Tuesday, revealing its overall ad sales were down 6% year-over-year …
